snippet: KAHN--Walter. SAR mourns with deep sorrow the passing of Walter Kahn, beloved husband of Grace and father of Nathan (Sandy) Kahn, generous benefactors and leaders of our school community. Vivian (Gerald) Adler and Simon (Robin) Kahn, and grandfather of SAR Alumni Peter (Tova), Allison and Michael Kahn and Joseph Adler. May the family be comforted amongst the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Jack C. Bendheim, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAHN--Walter. SAR mourns with deep sorrow the passing of Walter Kahn, beloved husband of Grace and father of Nathan (Sandy) Kahn, generous benefactors and leaders of our school community. Vivian (Gerald) Adler and Simon (Robin) Kahn, and grandfather of SAR Alumni Peter (Tova), Allison and Michael Kahn and Joseph Adler. May the family be comforted amongst the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Jack C. Bendheim, President 1/3
